    void
    TransactionalCacheWriter.prepareWithModifications(jakarta.transaction.Transaction transaction, BatchModification batchModification)
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Write modifications to the store in the prepare phase, as this is the only way we know the FINAL values of the entries.
